alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Latah County through 115 PM PDT... At 1251 PM PDT, broadcast media reported a strong thunderstorm over Troy, or 11 miles east of Moscow, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel cloud detected. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Deary, Helmer and Joel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
